Title: Aru Machi Kado no Monogatari
Description: ['On a certain street corner, there live a girl and her bear doll; a mischievous mouse named Kanku-bouya; a sycamore tree; an old street lamp; a moth; and posters containing a bar girl, a violinist, and a pianist. They all strive for life, but the world may not allow them to flourish.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' In ', Aru Machi Kado no Monogatari, ', will the inhabitants of the street corner be able to maintain their peaceful existences, or will war and tyranny plunge them into chaos?', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' [Written by MAL Rewrite]']
